title: feed
description:
This is the top level container which is typically the response for the API call. 
\
    A feed contains an array of activities usually related to each other via a subject. Ex: Peter's Lifestream

title.description: Human readable name of the feed

subject.description:
The main object of the feed. All objects default to being inReplyTo this object.
\
      If not present its the parent object

links.description: Links between an this object and other resources as defined in Web Linking
